ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | cvrp.b | |- B = ( Base ` K ) |
| 2 |  | cvrp.j | |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) |
| 3 |  | cvrp.m | |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) |
| 4 |  | cvrp.z | |- .0. = ( 0. ` K ) |
| 5 |  | cvrp.c | |- C = ( <o ` K ) |
| 6 |  | cvrp.a | |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) |
| 7 |  | #P_hlomcmcv | |- ( K e. HL -> ( K e. OML /\ K e. CLat /\ K e. CvLat ) ) |
| 8 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 | #P_cvlcvrp | |- ( ( ( K e. OML /\ K e. CLat /\ K e. CvLat ) /\ X e. B /\ P e. A ) -> ( ( X ./\ P ) = .0. <-> X C ( X .\/ P ) ) ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_syl3an1 | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B /\ P e. A ) -> ( ( X ./\ P ) = .0. <-> X C ( X .\/ P ) ) ) |
